column3: 霧の森の死闘　戦況：大将討滅
column4:
The Deathly Battle of the Forest of Mist:
Boss Annihilation

column3:
霧の森に闇の将が出現した！
森に潜む魔竜軍のリーダー格を
白竜の覚者達が一丸となって追い詰めたのだ
闇の将は覚者を異界へ送らんと目論む強敵である
メンバー同士の協力が不可欠であり、異界へ送られる
覚者をいかにして守り、素早く救出するかが重要だ
column4:
The Shadow Master has appeared in the Forest of Mist!

The Arisen of the White Dragon, united as one,
have cornered the leader of the Evil Dragon Army
that lurks within the forest.

The Shadow Master is a formidable enemy,
intent on sending the Arisen to another realm.

Cooperation among the members is essential,
to protect the Arisen and rescue them swiftly.

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎
column4: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

column3: 3.3WM管理
column4: 3.3 War Mission Management

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎
column4: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

column3:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされ
た悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！
column4:
At Firefall Mountain, the Evil Dragon,
who was thought to be destroyed by Prince Nedo
and the Arisen of the White Dragon, has arisen again.
The malevolent dragon power that scattered has
merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain,
going against the flow of the earth's purification,
and has taken on the form of a dragon once again,
spewing darkness and despair.
Defeat the revived Evil Dragon and protect the hope
that has been bound and preserved!

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎
column4: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

column3:
火垂れ山でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column4:
The war mission at Firefall Mountain has ended.
Reports on each individual battle achievement
will be provided shortly.
Until then, please remain on standby.

column3:
悪しき竜とのウォーミッションは終了いたしました
今は各個人の戦果を確認しているところです
column4:
The War Mission against the Evil Dragon has ended.
We are currently checking
the individual achievements of each person.

column3: 集計が終わるまで、しばらくの間お待ちください
column4:
Please wait a few moments for the tally
to be completed

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎
column4: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

column3:
火垂れ山野営地にいるザカリーより
各個人の戦果に伴う報酬を受け取ることが出来る
特別な報酬には受け取るための条件や上限数が
あるため、貢献具合に応じた品物を選ぶように
column4:
You can receive rewards corresponding
to individual achievements from Zachary
at the Firefall Mountain Campsite. 
There are conditions and limits for receiving
special rewards, so choose items based
on your level of contribution.

column3:
覚者殿のお持ちのDPと引き換えに
品物を提供させて頂きます
どうぞ、ラインナップをご確認ください
column4:
In exchange for the DP held by the Arisen,
I shall provide these goods.
Please take a look at the lineup.

column3:
一部のアイテムには、条件を満たした者にしか
与えられない特別なアイテムが存在いたします
column4:
There are special items that can only be given
to those who meet the requirements.

column3:
戦いにおいて、どれだけの成果を達成したかにより
提供させて頂くアイテムも変わっていきます
column4:
Depending on how well you have done in the battle,
we will offer you different items.

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎　戦況：悪しき竜再誕
column4:
Resurrection of the Flame of Despair:
Evil Dragon Reborn

column3:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされ
た悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！
column4:
At Firefall Mountain, the Evil Dragon,
who was thought to be destroyed by Prince Nedo
and the Arisen of the White Dragon, has arisen again.
The malevolent dragon power that scattered has
merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain,
going against the flow of the earth's purification,
and has taken on the form of a dragon once again,
spewing darkness and despair.
Defeat the revived Evil Dragon and protect the hope
that has been bound and preserved!

column3: 悪しき竜を討伐する
column4: Defeat the Evil Dragon

column3: 力を取り戻した悪しき竜を討伐する
column4: Defeat the Evil Dragon who has regained its power.

column3: 火垂れ山頂上を目指す
column4: Aim for the top of Firefall Mountain.

column3: 中腹を塞ぐ敵を全滅させる

column3: 頂上への入口を塞ぐ敵を全滅させる
column4:
Defeat all enemies blocking 
the entrance to the summit.

column3: 進行マーカーへ集合し、火垂れ山頂上へ移動する

and defense power increase.

The environment of Firefall Mountain
is quickly deteriorating.

column3: 【征圧完了】報酬を獲得する（残り１分）
column4:
[Complete] Obtain the rewards
(1 minute left)

column3:
火口内にある"火焔の竜晶"を破壊したことで
マグマの量が減り、戦闘エリアが広がった――
column4:
Destroying the "Dragon Crystals of Flame" in the crater
reduces the amount of magma, expanding your foothold.

column3:
火口内にある"火焔の竜晶"をすべて破壊したことで
マグマの量が減り、戦闘エリアが大きく広がった――
column4:
Destroying all "Dragon Crystals of Flame" in the crater
has reduced the amount of magma,
greatly expanding the battle area.

column3: 時間経過により戦況が悪化していく――
column4: The battle situation worsens over time.

column3:
火口内に宝箱が出現！
辺りを探索せよ――
column4:
A treasure chest has appeared within the crater! 
Explore the area...!

column3: 蘇りし絶望の炎　戦況：火垂れ山頂上
column4: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair: Firefall Peak

column3:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされ
た悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！
column4:
At Firefall Mountain, the Evil Dragon,
who was thought to be destroyed by Prince Nedo
and the Arisen of the White Dragon, has arisen again.
The malevolent dragon power that scattered has
merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain,
going against the flow of the earth's purification,
and has taken on the form of a dragon once again,
spewing darkness and despair.
Defeat the revived Evil Dragon and protect the hope
that has been bound and preserved!

column3: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記
column4: Acre Selund War Chronicles

column3: 3.4WM管理
column4: 3.4 War Mission Management

column3: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記
column4: Acre Selund War Chronicles

column3:
絶望に覆われた大地――
悪しき竜とその軍勢によって、全てが奪われたこの地で
覚者は戦い、消えかけていた希望を確かなものに
変えていった――
白竜の覚者よ、アッカーシェランを襲った数々の脅威に
今再び立ち向かえ
column4:
The land is covered in despair...
In this land where everything has been taken
by the Evil Dragon and its forces, 
the Arisen fought to turn the fading hope
into something certain...
O, Arisen of the White Dragon,
face once again the numerous threats
that have befallen Acre Selund.

column3: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記
column4: Acre Selund War Chronicles

column3:
本ウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column4:
The War Missions have ended,
and reports on each individual battle achievement
will be provided shortly.
Until then, please remain on standby.

column3: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記
column4: Acre Selund War Chronicles

column3:
メガドにいるレイモンドより、各個人の戦果に伴う
報酬を受け取ることが出来る
特別な報酬には受け取るための条件や上限数が
あるため、貢献具合に応じた品物を選ぶように
column4:
From Raymond in Megado, you can receive rewards
corresponding to individual achievements.
There are conditions and limits
to receiving special rewards, so choose items
based on your level of contribution.

column3: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記

Reduce Ushumgal's health 
and make the Black Knight appear

to make the Gate appear

Use the Gate that has appeared

(remaining：3)

of the Black King's Room

column3: 遭遇する魔物を全滅させる
column4: Defeat the encountered enemies

column3: 自軍旗の防衛に失敗した――
column4: Failed to defend our own flag...

column3:
ダクレイム砦に現れた魔物の討伐に成功した！
次の戦闘エリアへの封鎖が解除された
column4:
Successfully defeated the enemy
that appeared at Dacreim Fortress!
The blockade to the next area has been lifted.

column3: 自軍旗を狙う強敵が現れた！
column4: A formidable enemy aiming for our flag has appeared!

column3:
自軍旗を狙う強敵を全て討伐した！
ダクレイム砦へのワープが更に解放された
column4:
We have defeated all the powerful enemies
aiming for our flag! The warp to Dacreim Fortress
has been further unlocked.

column3:
プレイヤーの体力が尽きた――
自軍旗を狙う魔物が更に現れた
column4:
Player's Health Points have been depleted.
More enemies that aim for our army's flag
have appeared.

column3:
ジフール砦に現れた魔物の討伐に成功した！
次の戦闘エリアへの封鎖が解除された
column4:
Successfully defeated the demons
that appeared at Jifule Fortress!
Blockade to the next area has been lifted.

column3:
自軍旗を狙う強敵を全て討伐した！
ジフール砦へのワープが更に解放された
column4:
Successfully defeated all the strong enemies
aiming for our flag! Warp to Jifule Fortress

column3:

column4:

that appeared in The King's Hidden Chamber!

column3:
自軍旗を狙う強敵を全て討伐した！
隠匿の王間へのワープが更に解放された
column4:
Successfully defeated all the strong enemies
aiming for our flag! Warp to the King's Room

column3:
魔角の間に現れた魔物の討伐に成功した！
――黒騎士との戦いに合流せよ
column4:
Successfully defeated the enemy
that appeared in the Hall of the Magic Horns! 
Join the battle against the Black Knight.

column3: ウシュムガルの体力を削り、黒騎士を出現させよ――
column4:
Reduce Ushumgal's health 
to make the Black Knight appear...

column3:
プレイヤーの体力が尽きた――
手に入れた効果の全てが消滅した
column4:
Player's Health Points have been depleted.
All acquired Effects have disappeared.

column3: 討伐対象の魔物が弱体化した！
column4: The targeted enemy has been weakened!

column3: 旗の修復
column4: Flag Mending

column3: ＜黒示す王の間＞に黒騎士が出現した――！
column4:
The Black Knight has appeared
in the Black King's Room...!

column3: 幻影を討伐したことでウシュムガルの力が弱まった――
column4:
By defeating the Shadows,
Ushumgal's power has weakened.

column3:
【１/４】
ドラゴンズドグマオンラインを
ここまでプレイしてくれてありがとう！
column4:
[1/4]
Thank you for playing Dragon's Dogma Online up until now!

column3:
【２/４】
――見つかった！？
最高じゃねーか！
column4:
[2/4]
How did you find it!?
Isn't it great!

column3:
【３/４】
主にエレメントアーチャーで
皆さんと一緒にプレイしています
column4:
[3/4]
I mainly play as an Element Archer, 
playing together with everyone.

column3:
【４/４】
What will it be today?
ｵﾊﾞﾀﾞﾋﾞｨﾄｩﾃﾞｲ
column4:
【4/4】
What will it be today?

column3:
プレイヤーの体力が尽きた
戦況が悪化していく――
column4:
Player's Health Points have been depleted.
The war situation continues to deteriorate...

column3: 獣の将との戦い：ダクレイム砦
column4: Battle with the Beast Commander: Dacreim Fortress

column3:
ダクレイム砦に獣の将が出現した！
魔物を率い、集団となって襲い来る獣の将は
使役する魔物の力を使い、さらに強力な魔物を
呼び寄せる策を持っているようだ――
配下にある魔物への対処で戦局は大きく
左右されることになるだろう
column4:
A Beast Commander has appeared at Dacreim Fortress! 
Leading the monsters, the Beast Commander attacks in groups,
utilizing the power of the controlled monsters
and even summoning stronger ones. 

The outcome of the battle will greatly depend
on how we deal with the monsters under their command.

column3: 時間経過により戦況が悪化していく――
column4: The battle situation worsens over time.

column3: 獣の将が魔物を呼び寄せようとしている――
column4: The Beast Master is summoning enemies.

column3: 状況が悪化し、獣の将が強き魔物を呼び寄せる――！
column4:
The situation worsens as the Beast Master
summons powerful enemies!

column3: 召喚された魔物を一掃した――
column4: Summoned monsters have been eliminated.

column3:
獣の将が座すダクレイム砦へ
メンバーを集めて突撃せよ！
column4:
Gather the members and launch an assault
on Dacreim Fortress, where the Beast Commander is!

column3: 骸の将との戦い：ジフール砦
column4: Battle with the Necro Master: Jifule Fortress

column3:
ジフール砦に骸の将が出現した！
骸の将は、配下となる魔物を絶えず召喚し続けては
魔物の力を自らに吸収して自身を強化する
召喚された魔物に素早く対処し、骸の将の
強化行動を阻止せよ
column4:
A Necro Master has appeared at Jifule Fortress!
The Necro Master continuously summons
enemy creatures as his subordinates
and absorbs their power to strengthen himself.
Quickly deal with the summoned creatures
and prevent the Necro Master's strengthening actions.

column3: ジフール砦を征圧する（残り２０分）
column4: Conquer Jifule Fortress (20 min left)

column3:
殲滅できなかった魔物の残魂が
骸の将の力として吸収される！
column4:
The lingering souls of the enemies
that couldn't be completely exterminated
are absorbed by the power of the Necro Master!

column3: 時間経過により戦況が悪化していく――
column4: The battle situation worsens over time.

column3: 骸の将が魔物を呼び寄せた――！
column4: Necro Master called upon an Enemy!

column3: 召喚された魔物を一掃したことで、骸の将の力が弱まっていく――
column4:
By eliminating the summoned enemies,
the power of the Necro Master weakens...!

column3: 殲滅できなかった魔物の残魂が、骸の将の力として吸収される！
column4:
The lingering souls of the enemies
that couldn't be completely exterminated
are absorbed by the power of the Necro Master!

column3:
骸の将が座すジフール砦へ
メンバーを集めて突撃せよ！
column4:
Gather the members and launch an assault
on Jifule Fortress, where the Necro Master is!

column3: 戦の将との戦い：展望城
column4: Battle with the War Master：Lookout Castle

column3:
展望城に戦の将が出現した！
戦の将は、戦闘力の高いドワーフオーク軍や戦甲を
纏った魔物を数多く使役して覚者を追い詰める――
武器を強化する能力を駆使する戦の将自体にも
最大の警戒が必要だ
column4:
A War Master has appeared at Lookout Castle!

The War Master commands a formidable army
of Dwarf Orcs and enchanted creatures
clad in battle armor to corner the Arisen.

Extreme caution is required not only against
the War Master's ability to strengthen weapons,
but also against their own formidable combat prowess.

Stay vigilant and be prepared to face this powerful foe!

column3: 展望城を征圧する（残り２０分）
column4: Conquer the Lookout Castle (20 min left)

column4: The battle situation worsens over time.

column3:
戦の将が座す展望城へ
メンバーを集めて突撃せよ！
column4:
Gather the members and proceed to Lookout Castle,
where the War Master sits in command of the battle!

column3: 闇の将との戦い：霧の森
column4: Battle with the Shadow Master: Forest of Mist

column3:
霧の森に闇の将が出現した！
闇の将は、覚者を異界へ送る術を持つ強敵である
討ち果たすにはメンバー同士の協力が不可欠だ
特に異界へ送られそうな覚者をいかにして守り
素早く救出するかが重要となるだろう
column4:
The Shadow Master has appeared
in the Forest of Mist! 
The Shadow Master is a strong enemy
with the ability to send Arisen to another realm.

It is essential for the members to cooperate
in order to defeat them. It will be crucial to protect
the Arisen who are likely to be sent
to the other realm and rescue them quickly.

column3: 霧の森を征圧する（残り２０分）
column4: Conquer the Forest of Mist (20 min left)

闇の将が座す霧の森へ
メンバーを集めて突撃せよ！
column4:
Gather the members and launch an assault
on the Forest of Mist where the Shadow Master
sits in command!

column3: グリッテン砦攻防戦
column4: Battle for Fort Gritten

column3:
グリッテン砦――白竜神殿への魔物侵入をとどめる
最重要拠点のひとつである
北部からのオーク軍侵攻を阻むため、覚者レオ統率と
ヴァネッサ副隊長が率いる最前線部隊への参加人員が
今回も徴募される
連係戦術で悪鬼どもを葬り、レスタニアの平穏を護れ
column4:
Fort Gritten is one of the most critical strongholds,
aimed at preventing the intrusion of monsters
into the White Dragon Temple.
In order to repel the Orc forces invading
from the north, Arisen Leo leads the way,
and Deputy Commander Vanessa
leads the frontline unit. Once again,
personnel have been recruited to join these forces.
Through coordinated tactics,
let's bury those fiends and protect the peace of Lestania.
